  • Method Details

    • randomChooseWord

      public java.lang.String randomChooseWord()
      This method is what the computer uses to choose the word that the player will have to guess.
      Returns:
      a single word, as a string that the computer will use for the game.

    • haveUserTakeTurn

      public void haveUserTakeTurn()
      Has the user take a turn aka. guess a letter or the word. Updates the number of incorrect guesses the user has taken so far.

    • printHangman

      public void printHangman()
      This method print out the current game status and list of wrong guess

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Decide whether the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if game is over otherwise false.
